page.title: 08The Construction Industry
page.content: {Washbourne builders,Barthorpes}and {Jeynes}are family businesses and altogether they employ about 10 people. Washbournes build houses in Bredon at the rate of four a year. Barthorpes and Jeynes build houses and do general improvements & alterations. They all employ sub-contractors for work on electrical systems & plumbing. Washbournes use reconstituted stone mainly . {Aston Mill}Gravel Pits supply the construction industry with sand,gravel and pre-mix concrete.Their plant cost a million pounds and the workings are 14 to 20 feet deep. Lorries from the pit are only allowed to carry 30.5 tons each.About sixty people are employed.
